meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Indonesia, equal to one hundredth of a rupee.
meanings.sent1: In Indonesia, you can buy many snacks with just a few ratus.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my rupees for ratus to use in Indonesia.
meanings.sent3: The ratus in my pocket decided to go on a vacation without me!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny ratus, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of ratus clinking together was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A genus of rodents, including the common brown rat.
meanings.sent1: The ratus scurried across the floor of the barn.
meanings.sent2: I saw a ratus nibbling on some cheese in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The ratus in the lab were having a dance party when the scientists left.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were like a maze for the tiny ratus, searching for food.
meanings.sent5: The ratus's whiskers twitched as it sniffed the air for danger.
